bug.author: stereomatchingkiss
bug.summary: Example link of the image classification show 404
bug.description: I keep getting error 404 when I try to read the image classification examples--<denchmark-link:https://mxnet.apache.org/tutorials/python/predict_image.html>https://mxnet.apache.org/tutorials/python/predict_image.html</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/TEChopra1000>@TEChopra1000</denchmark-link> Please comment if you want to take this issue.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/stereomatchingkiss>@stereomatchingkiss</denchmark-link> would you please point me to the page you were on when you found the broken link?

In <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apache/incubator-mxnet/pull/16764>#16764</denchmark-link> , this image classification link was removed. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/stereomatchingkiss>@stereomatchingkiss</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/TEChopra1000>@TEChopra1000</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/zachgk>@zachgk</denchmark-link> If this is resolved, do you mind close this issue? Thanks
